name: TarotReading
0:
”Alexa, open tarot reading”
”Alexa, ask tarot reading for my fortune”
”Alexa, start tarot reading”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tarot reading
des:
Start by saying "Alexa Open Tarot Reading"
Alexa will then welcome you and begin the process of selecting your personal tarot card.
She will explain the card and provide how it applies to you. 
Reflect on the message to gain insight and guidance.
You can ask for a tarot reading any time, and she'll provide the card that is most insightful for you. 
Charmed in Company LLP, is the oldest Mystical Metaphysical shoppe in NJ and we developed this skill as a fun way to explore the tarot and its insights. To fill your day with metaphysical and mystical wisdom, check out our other Alexa skills (gem quiz, fairy trivia, angel reading, animal reading, etc) Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
